name: VR Mini Car Driver
description:
This is fantasy VR Mini Car Racing game on city highway and you could become champion! Drive your VR mini car through city traffic, jump over the static obstacles, and change lanes to avoid colliding with other cars.

Collect coins to increase score and unlock / upgrade a variety of cars. Its excellent mini game of car racing for free. Anyone who loves driving must try this lovely game including kids, boys & girls.

How far can you go ?

• Use left and right button to change lanes.
• Tap on screen to jump over a static obstacle.
• Avoid the cars collision and collect coins.

Special features:

• Stunning & Realistic 3D graphics
• Beautiful scenes
• Amazing sounds and background music
• Smooth animations
• User-friendly interface
• Realistic game play.
• Smooth Controls
• Fun and addicting
